Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball hit a pair of game-winning free throws with seven seconds remaining
Giannis Antetokounmpo was called for a foul while Ball was driving to the basket
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball was fined $100,000 by the NBA for making an offensive and derogatory comment
Coach Doc Rivers expressed frustration with the officiating saying 'There was clearly not a foul'
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball is now averaging 29.6 points, 6.3 assists and 5.3 rebounds this season
Others: LaMelo Ball leads the league in 4th quarter scoring, averaging 11.5 PPG in the 4th this season
